intro: A good code needs a good design!

about.body: My name is Gil Nimer, I am a self-taught passionate web developer and designer who focuses on long term projects, custom application development, and framework development. I love the idea of always been able to invent and create high quality web applications with the skills I gatherd in my four years of learning and developing client-side and server-side together with my designing skills.

lab.header: Take a look at my Lab

modules.desc: RuddyJS is a library that simplify and unify javascript, compatible with most browsers and platforms.
A solid web framework written in php, which produce secure and flexible CMS and custom APIs.
Ruddy2D is a 2D web based game engine that feature a full game engine including a physics engine.
